thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 23 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Television Broadcasts Updates On Offer On Behalf Of Co To Repurchase Shares

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Television Broadcasts Updates On Offer On Behalf Of Co To Repurchase Shares

organizations.name: brief-television broadcasts updates on offer on behalf of co

text:
Jan 23 (Reuters) - Television Broadcasts Ltd:
* REFERENCE IS MADE TO ANNOUNCEMENT OF COMPANY DATED 24 JANUARY 2017
* COMPANY HAS APPLIED TO EXECUTIVE SEEKING ITS CONSENT NOT TO PROCEED WITH OFFER.
* TELEVISION BROADCASTS -APPLICATION WILL BE MADE TO STOCK EXCHANGE FOR TRADING TO RESUME IN SHARES OF COMPANY AT 9:00 A.M. ON 24 JANUARY 2018. Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
